[INST]### Instruction : You are given a sequence of text. Generate a logical question, correct answer and three incorrect answers suitable for mcq from the input text.The output should be formatted as a json in the below format. '{"type": "object", "properties": {"Output": {"type": "object", "properties": {"question": {"type": "string"}, "correct_answer": {"type": "string"}, "incorrect_answers": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}}}, "required": ["question", "correct_answer", "incorrect_answers"]}}, "required": ["Output"]}}
### Input :Object Oriented Principles we saw so far
• Encapsulation
It keeps the data and the code safe from external interference. It is a mechanism for restricting direct access to some of the object’s component. Binding the data with the code that manipulates it.
• Inheritance
Inheritance allows a class to use the properties and methods of another class. In other words, the derived class inherits the states and behaviors from the base class.
• Polymorphism.
Polymorphism is the ability of an object to take on many forms. The most common use of polymorphism in OOP occurs when a parent class reference is used to refer to a child class object.[/INST] ### Output :
